**Description**: Once in the land of ciphers, people used triple a spell to break the treasure but it had one
more... Would you be able to break it?

```

```

The above is encoded thrice using HEX
DECODING: use CyberChef

```
35 61 20 36 39 20 37 38 20 37 34 20 35 61 20 35 31 20 34 33 20 37 62 20 33 33 20 36 62 20 35 61 20 36 63 20 34 31 20 33 33 20 36 31 20 35 66 20 34 31 20 34 30 20 37 31 20 34 30 20 37 64
```

```
5a 69 78 74 5a 51 43 7b 33 6b 5a 6c 41 33 61 5f 41 40 71 40 7d
```

```
ZixtZQC{3kZlA3a_A@q@}
```

The above code is ceaser cipher - you may use dcode.fr (https://www.dcode.fr/caesar-cipher)
you will get a result like the following:
